chat_history.message:
Hello,
My iPhone 12 is having the following issue:
The delivery agency says it's impossible to deliver my package and sends me back to you instead.
Thank you for your help,

Dear ecomobile

The delivery of the customer cannot be done according to DPD, and they redirect it to us. Can you reach out to them to ask them what is wrong?

Regards,
Marry from the Back Care Team.

Dear Backcare, 

We are confirming the issue with our logistics partner. In the meantime, please provide a clear address in the following format.

NAME
ADDRESS
POST CODE
TOWN/STREET NAME
COUNTRY
PHONE NUMBER

Thank you.

Regards,
Xt
